Calculator
----------
The Gcbh calculator is an ase Dynamics Child on unhealthy steriods. It runs the grand canonical basin hopping, however certain functionalities are hard coded.

For examples, you can refer to `gg/examples/ <https://github.com/kkjsawantucla/gg/blob/main/examples/>`_ folder or get detailed explanation in ref:`Examples`
